Text: Thanks.This is the last of the Death Wish movies to be released on Blu-ray. They need to release Telefon, another Bronson movie on Blu-ray. http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0076804/
Can anyone tell me why this version is only 91minutes long and my original DVD version is 95 minutes?
Can anyone tell me why my original DVD version is 95 min long and this one is only 91 min
can anyone tell me why my original dvd of this is 95 min and this is only 91 min - Thanks
This Blu-ray disc is 1080/50i. Which means PAL speedup is in play. The frame rate is 25fps. All the content is there, it just plays about 1 fps faster. Most Blu-rays are 24 fps.
